title: Spencer Woody
text:
Biostatistician by trade. Off-hours I build practical projects using R and microcontrollers.
All views expressed here are my own.

title: Projects
text:
Note



Everything here is personal work. I don’t post proprietary or internal company material.

title: Projects
text:
Featured





Arduino · Indoor Air Quality Display


E-ink IAQ dashboard
A battery-friendly e-ink display that reports CO₂ / PM / temperature-humidity, with reliability-focused power sequencing and logging.

Arduino ESP32 E-ink Sensors WIP


What I’m practicing: I²C/UART reliability, power budgeting, readable UI
Artifacts: wiring diagram, firmware snippets, photos
Next: data upload to home server; enclosure iteration

Read the build notes








R · Baseball Analytics


“Would this homer leave your park?”
A park-translation experiment: take a home-run trajectory and test it against other stadium geometries; visualize on a stylized field overlay.

R Data Viz Sports Prototype


What I’m practicing: geometry, visualization, reproducible pipelines
Artifacts: figures, notebooks, links to datasets

See the notebook
